mapper.select: SELECT funding_idx ,funding_current_price ,funding_target_price ,funding_start_date ,funding_end_date ,funding_permit_state ,funding_current_state FROM funding WHERE funding_permit_state = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE funding as a, (select b.funding_current_state, b.funding_idx from funding b where b.funding_end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND b.funding_current_price >= b.funding_target_price) as b set a.funding_current_state = 1 where a.funding_idx = b.funding_idx AND a.funding_current_state = 0

UPDATE funding as a, (select c.funding_current_state,c.funding_idx from funding c where c.funding_end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND c.funding_current_price < c.funding_target_price) as c set a.funding_current_state = 2 where a.funding_idx = c.funding_idx AND a.funding_current_state = 0
